folder.name: Binding
folder.tiptext: An object that transfers data between 2 components

string.name: Binding
string.tiptext: Create a binding between 2 components
string.text: new Binding(% source:Object, dest:Object, format:Object, is2way:Boolean %)

string.name: execute
string.tiptext: Perform a tranfer of data from source to destination

folder.name: ComponentMixins
folder.tiptext: Methods and properties that are available on any data-bound component

string.name: getField
string.tiptext: Get an object that gives access to a data field

string.name: initComponent
string.tiptext: Add all the ComponentMixin functions to a component

string.name: refreshDestinations
string.tiptext: Execute all bindings that have this component as the source

string.name: refreshFromSources
string.tiptext: Execute all bindings that have this component as the destination

string.name: validateProperty
string.tiptext: Examine a selected property to see if has valid data

folder.name: DataType
folder.tiptext: Provides get/set access to a field of a component property

string.name: encoder
string.tiptext: The encoder object for this field

string.name: formatter
string.tiptext: The formatter object for this field

string.name: kind
string.tiptext: The kind object for this field

string.name: getAnyTypedValue
string.tiptext: Retrieves the current value of the data, given a list of suggested types.

string.name: getAsBoolean
string.tiptext: Gets the current value, as a Boolean

string.name: getAsNumber
string.tiptext: Gets the current value, as a Number

string.name: getAsString
string.tiptext: Gets the current value, as a String

string.name: getTypedValue
string.tiptext: Get the value of this field, as a specified DataType

string.name: setAnyTypedValue
string.tiptext: Sets the data to a new value, tries more type conversions if necessary.

string.name: setAsBoolean
string.tiptext: Sets the current value, from a Boolean

string.name: setAsNumber
string.tiptext: Sets the current value, from a Number

string.name: setAsString
string.tiptext: Sets the current value, from a String

string.name: setTypedValue
string.tiptext: Set the value of this field

folder.name: EndPoint
folder.tiptext: A description of one EndPoint of a Binding

string.name: component
string.tiptext: The component or object containing the data

string.name: constant
string.tiptext: A constant data value (for source EndPoints only)

string.name: event
string.tiptext: The name of an event that the component emits when the data changes

string.name: location
string.tiptext: A path into the property that identifies a nested data field

string.name: property
string.tiptext: Which property of the component holds the data

folder.name: TypedValue
folder.tiptext: a data value together with type information

string.name: TypedValue
string.tiptext: constructor for the TypedValue class

string.name: typeName
string.tiptext: the name of the DataType of the data value

string.name: value
string.tiptext: the data value of this object

folder.name: DataHolder
folder.tiptext: A component that holds any data you want

string.name: data
string.tiptext: The data contained in this component

string.name: addEventListener
string.tiptext: Adds a listener for an event

string.name: currentItem
string.tiptext: Gets the current transfer object

string.name: dataProvider
string.tiptext: Returns the DataProvider API

string.name: deltaPacket
string.tiptext: Returns or assigns changes

string.name: filterFunc
string.tiptext: Method used for filtering items

string.name: filtered
string.tiptext: Indicates if items are filtered

string.name: itemClassName
string.tiptext: Object to create when assigning items

string.name: items
string.tiptext: Items of the collection

string.name: length
string.tiptext: Currently viewable length of items in collection

string.name: logChanges
string.tiptext: Indicates if mutations on the collection are recorded

string.name: properties
string.tiptext: List of schema specified

string.name: readOnly
string.tiptext: Indicates if the collection can be modified

string.name: schema
string.tiptext: Returns or assigns schema in XML format

string.name: selectedIndex
string.tiptext: contains the current transfer object's index within the DataSet

string.name: addEventListener
string.tiptext: Adds a listener for the specified event

string.name: addItem
string.tiptext: Adds the specified item to the collection

string.name: addItemAt
string.tiptext: Adds the specified item to the collection

string.name: addSort
string.tiptext: Sorts the items in the collection

string.name: applyUpdates
string.tiptext: Notifies listeners DeltaPacket is ready

string.name: changesPending
string.tiptext: Indicates if there are items in the DeltaPacket

string.name: clear
string.tiptext: Clears the current viewable items from the collection

string.name: createItem
string.tiptext: Returns a newly initialized item

string.name: disableEvents
string.tiptext: Stops listeners from receiving DataSet events

string.name: enableEvents
string.tiptext: Allows listeners to receive DataSet events

string.name: find
string.tiptext: Locates the specified transfer object within the current iterator

string.name: findFirst
string.tiptext: Locates the first occurance of the specified transfer object within the current iterator

string.name: findLast
string.tiptext: Locates the last occurance of the specified transfer object within the current iterator

string.name: first
string.tiptext: Moves to the first item in collection

string.name: getItemId
string.tiptext: Returns the unique id for the specified item.

string.name: getIterator
string.tiptext: Returns a clone of the current iterator

string.name: getLength
string.tiptext: Currently viewable length of items in collection

string.name: hasNext
string.tiptext: Indicates if iterator is at the end of the collection

string.name: hasPrevious
string.tiptext: Indciates if iterator at the begining of the collection

string.name: hasSort
string.tiptext: Indicates if the sort exists

string.name: isEmpty
string.tiptext: Indicates if there are items in the collection

string.name: last
string.tiptext: Moves to the last item in the collection

string.name: loadFromSharedObj
string.tiptext: Retrieves the internal state of the DataSet from a shared object

string.name: locateById
string.tiptext: moves the current iterator to the item with the specified id

string.name: next
string.tiptext: Moves to the next item in the collection

string.name: previous
string.tiptext: Moves to the previous item in the collection

string.name: removeAll
string.tiptext: Remove all items from the DataSet regardless of current iterator settings

string.name: removeEventListener
string.tiptext: Removes the specified event listener

string.name: removeItem
string.tiptext: Removes the specified item

string.name: removeItemAt
string.tiptext: Removes the item at the specified index

string.name: removeRange
string.tiptext: Removes the current iterator range

string.name: removeSort
string.tiptext: Removes the specified sort from the DataSet

string.name: saveToSharedObj
string.tiptext: Saves the internal state of the DataSet to a shared object

string.name: setIterator
string.tiptext: Sets the current iterator of the DataSet to that specified

string.name: setRange
string.tiptext: Sets the current iterator range

string.name: skip
string.tiptext: Moves the iterator the amount specified

string.name: useSort
string.tiptext: Uses the sort specified

string.name: addItem
string.tiptext: Dispatched before item is added

string.name: afterLoaded
string.tiptext: Dispatched after items array is assigned

string.name: calcFields
string.tiptext: Dispatched when calculated fields should be updated

string.name: deltaPacketChanged
string.tiptext: Dispatched when the delta packet is ready to be used

string.name: iteratorScrolled
string.tiptext: Dispatched when the iterator's position is changed

string.name: modelChanged
string.tiptext: Dispatched when the items have been modified in some way

string.name: newItem
string.tiptext: Dispatched when a new item is constructed by the DataSet, before being added to the collection.

string.name: removeItem
string.tiptext: Dispatched before an item is to be removed

string.name: resolveDelta
string.tiptext: Dispatched when a DeltaPacket is assigned that contains messages

folder.name: RDBMSResolver
folder.tiptext: Converts deltapackets to DB formatted XML

string.name: deltaPacket
string.tiptext: Object that describes a set of changes to a dataset

string.name: fieldInfo
string.tiptext: Specifies key fields and non-updatable fields

string.name: nullValue
string.tiptext: String used to indicate a null value for a field

string.name: tableName
string.tiptext: DB table name put in the XML updatePacket

string.name: updateMode
string.tiptext: Determines which fields are set as key fields in the updatePacket

string.name: updatePacket
string.tiptext: XML translation of the DeltaPacket that can be sent to a server

string.name: updateResults
string.tiptext: Receives packet of server results for translation into a deltaPacket

string.name: addEventListener
string.tiptext: Adds a listener for an event

string.name: addFieldInfo
string.tiptext: Adds a new fieldInfo collection item

string.name: beforeApplyUpdates
string.tiptext: Fired immediately before the updatePacket is sent to the server

string.name: reconcileResults
string.tiptext: Fired immediately before operation results are sent to the dataset

string.name: reconcileUpdates
string.tiptext: Fired immediately before database updates are sent to the dataset

folder.name: WebServiceConnector
folder.tiptext: A component that calls a Web Service method

string.name: WSDLURL
string.tiptext: The URL of the WSDL file that defines a web service

string.name: multipleSimultaneousAllowed
string.tiptext: If true, the call will execute even a call is in progress; if false, not

string.name: operation
string.tiptext: Name of an operation within the service defined by WSDLURL

string.name: params
string.tiptext: Data that will be sent to the server

string.name: results
string.tiptext: Result of the last successfull web service call

string.name: suppressInvalidCalls
string.tiptext: If true, invalid data will not be sent; if false, invalid data is used

string.name: addEventListener
string.tiptext: Adds a listener for an event

string.name: trigger
string.tiptext: Calls the web service operation

string.name: result
string.tiptext: Fired when results property is updated.

string.name: send
string.tiptext: Fired prior to the web service call

string.name: status
string.tiptext: Fired when the status changes or on errors

folder.name: XMLConnector
folder.tiptext: A component that sends and receives XML documents

string.name: URL
string.tiptext: The URL that is used when doing HTTP operations

string.name: direction
string.tiptext: Will data be sent, or received, or both?

string.name: ignoreWhite
string.tiptext: Set to true to ignore white space

string.name: multipleSimultaneousAllowed
string.tiptext: If true, the call will execute even if a call is in progress; if false, not

string.name: params
string.tiptext: Data that will be sent to the server

string.name: results
string.tiptext: Result of the last HTTP operation

string.name: suppressInvalidCalls
string.tiptext: If true, invalid data will not be sent; if false, invalid data is used

string.name: addEventListener
string.tiptext: Adds a listener for an event

string.name: trigger
string.tiptext: Initiates an HTTP request that sends and/or receives XML data

string.name: result
string.tiptext: Fired when results property is updated.

string.name: send
string.tiptext: Fired prior to the web service call

string.name: status
string.tiptext: Fired when the status changes or on errors

folder.name: XUpdateResolver
folder.tiptext: Fired before server updates are sent via databinding

string.name: deltaPacket
string.tiptext: Log of changes to the DataSet

string.name: includeDeltaPacketInfo
string.tiptext: Set to true to include additional deltapacket info

string.name: updateResults
string.tiptext: Result packet returned from the server

string.name: xupdatePacket
string.tiptext: Log of changes to a DataSet in XUpdate format

string.name: addEventListener
string.tiptext: Adds a listener for an event

string.name: beforeApplyUpdates
string.tiptext: Fired before the XupdatePacket property is updated

string.name: reconcileResults
string.tiptext: Fired before operation results are sent via databinding

folder.name: Delta
folder.tiptext: Contains list of changes to an item

string.name: addDeltaItem
string.tiptext: Adds the specified DeltaItem

string.name: getChangeList
string.tiptext: Returns list of DeltaItems for this Delta

string.name: getDeltaPacket
string.tiptext: Returns the associated DeltaPacket

string.name: getId
string.tiptext: Returns the unique ID for this delta

string.name: getItemByName
string.tiptext: Returns the named DeltaItem or null

string.name: getMessage
string.tiptext: Returns the associated message or blank

string.name: getOperation
string.tiptext: Returns the associated operation

string.name: getSource
string.tiptext: Returns original source object that was changed

string.name: argList
string.tiptext: Returns arguments list

string.name: curValue
string.tiptext: Returns the current server value

string.name: delta
string.tiptext: Returns reference to Delta container

string.name: kind
string.tiptext: Returns kind of DeltaItem

string.name: message
string.tiptext: Returns associated message

string.name: name
string.tiptext: Returns associated name

string.name: newValue
string.tiptext: Returns the new value

string.name: oldValue
string.tiptext: Returns the original value

string.name: getConfigInfo
string.tiptext: Returns configuration information

string.name: getIterator
string.tiptext: Returns an iterator of the changes

string.name: getSource
string.tiptext: Returns originating component

string.name: getTimestamp
string.tiptext: Returns the time stamp when the DeltaPacket was created

string.name: getTransactionId
string.tiptext: Returns associated transaction ID

string.name: logChanges
string.tiptext: Returns true if changes are being logged

string.name: Log
string.tiptext: Creates a new instance of a Log object

string.name: onLog
string.tiptext: used to handle logger output

folder.name: PendingCall
folder.tiptext: information regarding an outstanding call to a service

string.name: myCall
string.tiptext: current soap call

string.name: request
string.tiptext: current SOAP request document

string.name: response
string.tiptext: current SOAP result document

string.name: getOutputParameter
string.tiptext: return the output parameter at the index specified

string.name: getOutputParameterByName
string.tiptext: return output parameter for the specified name

string.name: getOutputParameters
string.tiptext: return all members of the parameters array that are either OUT or INOUT mode

string.name: getOutputValue
string.tiptext: returns a single output value

string.name: getOutputValues
string.tiptext: returns values of the output parameters

string.name: onFault
string.tiptext: called when a fault occurs

string.name: onResult
string.tiptext: called when results are ready

string.name: concurrency
string.tiptext: indicates what type of concurrency is allowed

string.name: doDecoding
string.tiptext: indicates if the decoding should be performed

string.name: doLazyDecoding
string.tiptext: indicates if the decoding should be performed on an as needed basis

folder.name: WebService
folder.tiptext: provide the entry point for calling a webservice

string.name: WebService
string.tiptext: Creates a new instance of a WebService object

string.name: getCall
string.tiptext: returns the specified SOAP call

string.name: onFault
string.tiptext: this method will be called if the WSDL cannot be parsed and the proxy cannot be created

string.name: onLoad
string.tiptext: this method will be called once the WSDL has been parsed and the proxy created
